title: PM USA RETAIL MASTERS NON-COMPLIANCE NOTICE
notice: This form serves as your notice of a non-compliance with our Retail Masters contract #-4
nonComplianceReasons: Non-compliance with PM required space/position on carton fixture
No PM USA centralized pack fixture in #1 location or Marlboro Counter Display
No separate PM Discount Carton and Pack Displays and POS in #1 Discount location (if required)
Lack of Fair Share of Total Inventory/Facings/Distribution
No PM Signage in #1 Location/Lack of Fair Share of Signage
Failure to submit velocity reports verifying store's cigarette sales by brand and packing
Lack of Compliance with agreed upon plan-o-gram
Non-acceptance of recommended PM New Brands
Foreign objects/competitive merchandise on or obstructing displays/fixtures
Diminished PM visibility due to competitive POS
No exclusive PM USA centralized pack fixture(s) with PM brands on top half of fixture
No exclusive Marlboro Front End Display at minimum 1/2 checklanes/Promotional Display at express lane
No Distribution on PM B&W/PL/or Other Designated Brand (if required)
correctiveActions: Continuous non-compliance situations will result in the termination of our Retail Masters contract
